SA05n857:1: śrībuddha buddhādhipa buddharūpa buddhānvitān bodhayase vibuddhaḥ |
SA05n857:2: buddhyā samastān khalu buddhaputra santoṣya yogena tu buddhameghām || 1 ||
SA05n857:3: śrīvajra vajrāmala jātavajra vajreṇa dīptena pradīpya lokam |
SA05n857:4: dadan yogena tu vajrasaṃvarṣaṃ vajrātmabhāvaṃ kuruṣe suvajra || 2 ||
SA05n857:5: śrīratna ratnākara ratnamegha ratnena ratnaṃ ramase suratna |
SA05n857:8: vibodhya padmodbhava padmatoyaiḥ padme kule sthāpayase supadma || 4 ||
SA05n857:9: śrīviśva viśvāviśa viśvajñānaṃ viśvena viśvaviṣayena lipta |
SA05n857:10: viśvena sattvān vinayeṣu viśvaṃ vidyāṃ suvidyāṃ sukhapācitāmiti || 5 ||
